tool_description: Backed by a database of over 38 000 throwable email domains. This will be very helpful when you have to contact your users and you want to avoid errors causing lack of communication or want to block "spamboxes".
title: Temp Mail Blocker

api_list.name: Check Temp Mail
api_list.description: This takes email as a input and returns, valid parameter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://temp-mail-blocker.p.rapidapi.com/{email}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temp-mail-blocker.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
